Name: Cyren Threat Intelligence
Author: Cyren - support@cyren.com
Description: The [Cyren Threat Intelligence](https://www.cyren.com/) solution provides the capability to ingest Cyren IP reputation and malware URL threat intelligence into Microsoft Sentinel using the Codeless Connector Framework (CCF). This solution deploys REST API poller connectors, a custom log table, data collection rules, and optional workbooks to help security teams detect and investigate network-based threats.
